snippet: Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered his government on Wednesday to rein in rising vodka prices, as he battles to preserve his popularity amid an aggravating economic crisis....

headline.print_headline: Putin Orders Vodka Price Cap as Russia's Economic Crisis Escalates
headline.main: Putin Orders Vodka Price Cap as Russia's Economic Crisis Escalates

lead_paragraph: Russian President Vladimir Putin ordered his government on Wednesday to rein in rising vodka prices, as he battles to preserve his popularity amid an aggravating economic crisis.
